title: Planar region with log function part - a

content.description: In the figure above, R is the shaded region in the first quadrant bounded by the graph of y=4ln(3-x), the horizontal line y=6, and the vertical line x=2.
content.question: Find the area of R.

topic.text: 8.4: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of x

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Use appropriate mathematical symbols and notation (e.g., Represent a derivative using Æ’'(x), y', and dy/dx).
